title: [Question] Can I request COE to consider only isa2 marks for final Isa?
content:
I had an injury and won't be able to write isa1 .
Can I request COE to consider isa2 marks for final Isa?

comments.body: But you should know that it might not work out and it's not a 100% guarantee
I think they will give more weightage to your ESA, and only consider ISA-2 with it. Thatâ€™s what happened to someone in my batch

Oh.
I can convince them tho , right? The injury's pretty serious and I've been hospitalized for more than 48hrs now.
